page.title: 12Bramhope: Employment
page.content: In Bramhope most people travel to work in Leeds,which is 20kms away.17 people work in Bramhope itself.The majority work within a 25km radius of Bramhope.11 people work farther afield. The majority of Bramhope residents we questioned were involved in what we termed{"Services to people"}i.e. {Banking,Teaching,Health,Catering, {Public Services,Communication,Law etc. A much smaller group was involved in {Manufacturing Industries.}Fewer people still had jobs in the{Retail Trade. Most children we talked to expect to move out of Bramhope to get a job. Two local families own a nearby farm and the children expect to work on the farm when they leave school.
